feedback.fit: The loose, oversized fit of the shirt pairs well with the fitted denim shorts for a balanced silhouette.
feedback.color: The neutral white and dark blue color scheme is classic and versatile, but could benefit from a pop of color.
feedback.footwear: The ankle boots add a slightly edgy vibe and work with the casual outfit.
feedback.accessories: Some simple jewelry like a pendant necklace or bracelet could elevate the look further.
feedback.style: Overall, this is a solid casual chic outfit that is easy to wear for various occasions.

labels.fit: Loose, boxy coat with fitted dress

feedback.fit: The boxy cut of the coat contrasts nicely with the fitted mini dress for an interesting silhouette.
feedback.color: The bright green, yellow and red create a bold, eye-catching color palette that feels cheerful and confident.
feedback.footwear: The red clogs perfectly match the handbag and add to the mod 60s vibe.
feedback.accessories: The matching red handbag ties the look together cohesively.
feedback.style: This is a fun, colorful take on retro 60s mod style that makes a strong fashion statement.

feedback.fit: The fitted tank top tucked into the high-waisted full skirt creates a classic feminine pin-up silhouette.
feedback.color: The lime green and red make a bold, complementary color pairing, while the white polka dots add a cute retro touch.
feedback.footwear: The black pumps are a safe, neutral choice that doesn't compete with the outfit.
feedback.accessories: The bunch of colorful balloons are a whimsical prop that enhance the playful retro vibe.
feedback.style: This look perfectly captures the flirty, feminine aesthetic of vintage pin-up style.

feedback.fit: The fitted tee and high-waisted shorts create a casual, slightly retro silhouette.
feedback.color: The red, white and blue is a classic color combo, but the shades don't seem to mesh perfectly.
feedback.footwear: The red sneakers match the shirt but seem a bit heavy for the shorts.
feedback.accessories: The floral handbag clashes a bit with the graphic tee. A solid color may have worked better.
feedback.style: The outfit has potential as a casual retro look, but a few tweaks to the color and accessory choices would improve the overall cohesion.

feedback.fit: The loose-fitting tee half-tucked into the mini skirt creates a relaxed, effortless silhouette.
feedback.color: The white, red and tan form a fresh, summery color palette.
feedback.footwear: The tan wedge sandals elongate the legs and dress up the casual outfit a bit.
feedback.accessories: The look is quite simple and could be elevated with the addition of some jewelry or a hat.
feedback.style: Overall, this is a cute, unfussy summer outfit that can easily go from day to night.

labels.fit: Fitted tank top with A-line skirt

feedback.fit: The fitted denim tank tucked into the A-line mini skirt creates a balanced, feminine silhouette.
feedback.color: The light blue denim against the bright yellow skirt makes for a bold, stylish color-blocked look.
feedback.footwear: The tan ankle-strap heels complement the outfit perfectly and elongate the legs.
feedback.accessories: The outfit makes a statement on its own, but a long pendant necklace could be a nice accent.
feedback.style: This is a confidently chic look that combines on-trend color-blocking with a classic feminine silhouette.

feedback.fit: The loose patterned pants paired with the fitted tank create a relaxed, slightly bohemian silhouette.
feedback.color: The coral top works with the blues in the pants, but the overall look is quite busy.
feedback.footwear: The sneakers match the outfit but look a bit heavy and clunky here.
feedback.accessories: The busy pattern of the pants doesn't leave much room for accessories, but the look feels a bit unfinished.
feedback.style: The outfit has an eclectic, artistic vibe but needs some editing for a more put-together feel.

feedback.fit: The fitted blazer and mini skirt create a leggy, feminine silhouette with an edgy twist.
feedback.color: The black and pink color scheme is flirty and fun, while still being grounded by the black.
feedback.footwear: The chunky black platform boots add a punk-inspired edge that balances the short skirt.
feedback.accessories: The silver statement necklace and white bag add nice contrasting touches.
feedback.style: This look combines girly and edgy elements for a flirtatious going-out outfit with attitude.

labels.fit: Fitted top with ruffled mini skirt

feedback.fit: The fitted sweater tucked into the ruffled mini skirt highlights the waist and creates a flirty, feminine silhouette.
feedback.color: The gray and black palette is chic, while the pop of red adds vibrancy.
feedback.footwear: The red platform pumps elongate the legs and add a bold accent color.
feedback.accessories: The black belt emphasizes the waist, and the bow headband adds a cute retro touch.
feedback.style: This outfit has a chic, slightly retro-inspired aesthetic that feels current and put-together.

feedback.fit: The loose fit of the dress is made more flattering with the addition of the belt to cinch the waist.
feedback.color: The all black is chic but a bit plain. The silver belt adds some welcome shine.
feedback.footwear: The red pumps are an unexpected pop of color that livens up the look.
feedback.accessories: The silver belt adds definition at the waist. Some silver jewelry could tie the look together even more.
feedback.style: This is a easy party look that is elevated by small styling details like the belt and red shoes.
